code: import React from'react';import{useDispatch,useSelector}from'react-redux';import SettingsForm from'../../layout/components/settings/SettingsForm';import{resetSettings,updateSettings}from'../../redux/settings/actions';import{usePageData}from'../../hooks/usePage';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var pageData={title:'Settings',fulFilled:true,breadcrumbs:[{title:'Home',route:'default-dashboard'},{title:'Settings'}]};var SettingsPage=function SettingsPage(){var settings=useSelector(function(state){return state.settings;});var dispatch=useDispatch();usePageData(pageData);var onResetSettings=function onResetSettings(){dispatch(resetSettings());};var onUpdateSettings=function onUpdateSettings(settings){dispatch(updateSettings(settings));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-md-6",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SettingsForm,{onResetSettings:onResetSettings,onUpdateSetting:onUpdateSettings,settings:settings})})});};export default SettingsPage;
